thread.title: Swiss authorities probing seven banks for metals price fixing
thread.title_full: Swiss authorities probing seven banks for metals price fixing

title: Swiss authorities probing seven banks for metals price fixing
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Sep 28, 2015, 07:02 BST - UK Markets open in 58 mins. Swiss authorities probing seven banks for metals price fixing AFP – 5 minutes ago View Photo 

Swiss competition authorities said Monday they were investigating UBS (NYSEArca: FBGX - news ) , HSBC, Deutsche Bank (Other OTC: DBAGF - news ) and four other banks on suspicion of price fixing in the precious metals market. 
The Swiss Competition Commission (COMCO) "has today opened an investigation against two Swiss banks, UBS and Julius Baer (LSE: 0QO6.L - news ) , as well as against the foreign financial institutions Deutsche Bank, HSBC, Barclays (LSE: BARC.L - news ) , Morgan Stanley (Xetra: 885836 - news ) and Mitsui," it said in a statement. 
It (Other OTC: ITGL - news ) said it had indications that the banks had "possibly concluded illegal (price-fixing) deals ... within the precious metals market."
